	setv(v)

	java.log(error)
}
let chapters = e.select(".book-chapter a");

if (book.getVariable("custom") != "") {
	   java.toast("\nâœ…ç›®å½•ä¹±åºä¿®å¤å·²å¼€å¯")
	   chapters.forEach((item) => {
        let title = item.text()
        let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/ç¬¬(\d+)(-\d+)?ç« /);
        if (chapterNumberMatch) {
            chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        }
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: item.attr("href")
        });
    });
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {

}
chapterData

	//java.log(i)

		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),

try{

	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)

		}
	result=c
</js>
